content.raw:
Oh, I did not know that is a bug in ODE what is causing problems to gazebo. I thought that was a bad use of ODE coming by our code or by user code/configuration which was making things to crash. Indeed there is no point in knowing that there is a known bug in ODE.

BTW, has been reported to ODE upstream? fixed in any particular version?
content.html:
Oh, I did not know that is a bug in ODE what is causing problems to gazebo. I thought that was a bad use of ODE coming by our code or by user code/configuration which was making things to crash. Indeed there is no point in knowing that there is a known bug in ODE.

BTW, has been reported to ODE upstream? fixed in any particular version?
